title: Everything is so stressful, why do I even try anymore? Everything is getting harder and I dont know what to do.. what do I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, you can give up, but then what? In my opinion, we are here for a reason. Maybe to test our strength or to teach us something. So you just have to go thru it. You have to feel the crappy feelings, the hole in your chest. You have to scream and cry and fight just to make it thru to the next second. We are suppose to feel those feelings because without those feelings how could you truly know what Joy feels like? You have to take the good with the bad and just deal any way you can. The bad times never last and neither do the good. I think the test is how well you can fight thru the terrible times. No one im this life has it easy and you are definitely not alone in feeling the way you do. Just hang on and fight. Find whatever joy you can and focus on that. Watch videos of kittens or just emerse yourself in a video game or hobby. Meditate, find your joy. When you can't, scream and cry then wake up and try again. Good luck. Stay you through it all. Better times will come eventually.

Well firstly don’t give up because you will regret it, imagine it like this your in a room filled with all your hopes and dreams that only you could do all looking at you angry because now they have no reason to exist. I don’t know your situation but because of how much stress is in my life I learned how to just turn it off the first step to doing that is every time you feel the stress try to say that soon you will be doing great, you will love yourself, and be happy it’s the best advice I can give you

Turn off your phone and go take a hike. Like literally go into nature. Go camping if you can. Disconnect from the bullshit and gain a new perspective. Cut out toxic people (family included if needed). Message me if you need to talk to a stranger and get shit off your chest
